thread.section_title: Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Midtown Manhattan/Penn Station - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Staff friendly hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely Staff friendly hotel - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Midtown Manhattan/Penn Station, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: cruise093
title: Lovely Staff friendly hotel
text: After a horrible experience previously on our special visit to the states we finally arrived at our last stop on our trip and have to say it was a treat to meet such friendly staff and receive such good service so without going into a lot of detail I will just say what a lovely stay we had here we had a room originally on a lower floor but having pointed out we had asked for a room on a high floor with a view we were quickly changed to room 1712 and it was lovely large room with nice view and the service we received from Joe and Cherise on the front desk was exemplary they are a great asset to the company and I thank them for the kindness they showed us also the beverage manageress for her kindness in giving us a complementary bottle of bubbly some chocolates and fruit it was very much appreciated and was a lovely ending to what had been a disaster of a 52nd wedding anniversary trip to the states
